definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
man and wife fall out (idiom, from Book of Changes); marital strife
a couple in a short-lived, improper relationship
similarity in features of an old couple/common facial traits that show predestination to be married together
popular Sichuan cold dish made of thinly sliced beef and beef offal
husband and wife in youth, companions in old age
pinyin: shao4 nian2 fu1 qi1 lao3 lai2 ban4

sentences.english: Pelvic inflammatory disease patients can be a life?
sentences.chinese: 盆腔炎患者可以過夫妻生活嗎？

sentences.english: Have a both husband and wife the old age son, see as the darling a baby.
sentences.chinese: 有一家夫妻倆老年得子，視爲心肝寶貝。

sentences.english: The drama group did a sketch about a couple buying a new car.
sentences.chinese: 劇社上演了一出夫妻二人買新車的短劇。

sentences.english: Consider enrolling in a couples communication class.
sentences.chinese: 可以考慮參加一些夫妻溝通課程。

sentences.english: We were joined in marriage last year.
sentences.chinese: 我們是去年結爲夫妻的。

sentences.english: This is a light comedy and famous for the antiphonal singing of the spouses.
sentences.chinese: 這是一出小喜劇，以夫妻對唱而出名。

sentences.english: The two co-star as husband and wife in the upcoming film Dream House, slated for a fall release.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆將在秋季上演的電影《惡靈凶宅》中扮演夫妻。

sentences.english: Joe and Mary are a couple who share weal and woe.
sentences.chinese: 喬治和瑪麗是一對患難夫妻。

sentences.english: My brother and his wife are a happy couple.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟和他的妻子是一對幸福的夫妻。

sentences.english: She separated the couple by drawing a river, the Milky Way, with her hairpin between them.
sentences.chinese: 她用金簪畫出了銀河隔開了這對夫妻。

sentences.english: Salma asks her husband when the couple get home.
sentences.chinese: 等這對夫妻回家後，薩爾瑪這麼問她的先生帕可。

sentences.english: I say it is just a con-incidence that you two have a couple look.
sentences.chinese: 我說，你們只是碰巧有着那夫妻相罷了。

sentences.english: A lovely couple presides over this spick-and-span operation.
sentences.chinese: 一對可愛的夫妻操持着這一嶄新的設施。

sentences.english: But couples can lasso this predictability to keep the fire hot.
sentences.chinese: 但是夫妻可以運用這一可預測性保持愛情的甜蜜。

sentences.english: Couples using the "missionary position" during coitus may thereby increase the chance of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 的夫妻因而可以增加懷孕的機會。

definition: mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
